languages.text: Спустя две вахты исследований команда перехватывает слабый сигнал, исходящий от одного из рабочих поселений в глубине ущелья. Из-за перебоев со связью старший бригадир выработки путает ваш корабль с судном-надзирателем династии Винтерскейл, что должно было прибыть сюда еще девять циклов тому назад. По нестабильному каналу он безрадостно докладывает, что запасы адамантиума в недрах мира почти иссякли, и в ближайший десяток лет планета полностью исчерпает свои ресурсы. С трудом разобрав через помехи, что на орбите находится корабль другой династии Вольных Торговцев, бригадир неловко извиняется и замолкает.

traits.locale_text: Спустя две вахты исследований команда перехватывает слабый сигнал, исходящий от одного из рабочих поселений в глубине ущелья. Из-за перебоев со связью старший бригадир выработки путает ваш корабль с судном-надзирателем династии Винтерскейл, что должно было прибыть сюда еще девять циклов тому назад. По нестабильному каналу он безрадостно докладывает, что запасы адамантиума в недрах мира почти иссякли, и в ближайший десяток лет планета полностью исчерпает свои ресурсы. С трудом разобрав через помехи, что на орбите находится корабль другой династии Вольных Торговцев, бригадир неловко извиняется и замолкает.

languages.text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.
languages.original_text: Спустя две вахты исследований команда перехватывает слабый сигнал, исходящий от одного из рабочих поселений в глубине ущелья. Из-за перебоев со связью старший бригадир выработки путает ваш корабль с судном-надзирателем династии Винтерскейл, что должно было прибыть сюда еще девять циклов тому назад. С трудом разобрав через помехи, что на орбите находится корабль другой династии Вольных Торговцев, бригадир неловко извиняется и замолкает.

traits.locale_text: After a full day of exploration the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale dynasty one and asks what the reason for a delay of nine cycles was. The man grimly reports on the nearly depleted adamantium ore deposits. The planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade, which is why he suggests moving some of the workers to a different mine with the upcoming supply ship.

After a full day of exploration the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale dynasty one and asks what the reason for a delay of nine cycles was. The man grimly reports on the nearly depleted adamantium ore deposits. The planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade, which is why he suggests moving some of the workers to a different mine with the upcoming supply ship.

After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantium ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

languages.text: Après deux tours d'exploration, l'équipage intercepte un signal faible provenant d'un des camps de travail dans le gouffre profond. La connexion étant instable, le contremaître prend votre vaisseau pour un vaisseau des Winterscale attendu depuis neuf cycles. Sur un ton sombre, il signale que les gisements d'adamantine du monde sont presque épuisés et qu'il n'y aura plus rien à extraire dans moins de dix ans. Non sans difficulté, il capte suffisamment de mots pour comprendre que le vaisseau en orbite appartient à la maison d'{mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} et présente alors de maladroites excuses avant de se taire.
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

traits.locale_text: Après deux tours d'exploration, l'équipage intercepte un signal faible provenant d'un des camps de travail dans le gouffre profond. La connexion étant instable, le contremaître prend votre vaisseau pour un vaisseau des Winterscale attendu depuis neuf cycles. Sur un ton sombre, il signale que les gisements d'adamantium du monde sont presque épuisés et qu'il n'y aura plus rien à extraire dans moins de dix ans. Non sans difficulté, il capte suffisamment de mots pour comprendre que le vaisseau en orbite appartient à la maison d'{mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande} et présente alors de maladroites excuses avant de se taire.

languages.text: 2回の探査監視の後、クルーは深い裂け目にある労働者居住区のひとつから、かすかな信号を傍受する。接続が不安定なため、作業長はあなたの船をウィンタースケール船と勘違いした。第九サイクル前に1隻到着する予定だったのだ。作業長は今にも切れそうなチャンネル越しに、この惑星のアダマンチウム鉱床が底をつきかけており、あと10年もしないうちに完全に採掘され尽くしてしまうだろうと報告する。彼は軌道上の船は別の自由開拓者のものであることを伝える言葉をなんとか絞り出し、ぎこちなく謝った後、沈黙した。
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

traits.locale_text: 2回の探査監視の後、クルーは深い裂け目にある労働者居住区のひとつから、かすかな信号を傍受する。接続が不安定なため、作業長はあなたの船をウィンタースケール船と勘違いした。第九サイクル前に1隻到着する予定だったのだ。作業長は今にも切れそうなチャンネル越しに、この惑星のアダマンチウム鉱床が底をつきかけており、あと10年もしないうちに完全に採掘され尽くしてしまうだろうと報告する。彼は軌道上の船は別の自由開拓者のものであることを伝える言葉をなんとか絞り出し、ぎこちなく謝った後、沈黙した。

languages.text: 经过两轮探测之后，船员截获了微弱的信号，来自深渊之中的其中一处工人定居点。由于连接不稳定，领班误以为你的飞船来自温特斯凯尔家族，因为他们的船早该在九个周期之前就抵达这颗行星。通过不稳定的频道，工头以严峻的声音报告，说这个世界的精金矿脉几乎已经全部采光，剩余的矿藏只能支撑不到十年的时间。双方经过好一番沟通之后，他才终于意识到，轨道上的这艘飞船来自另一个行商浪人王朝。工头尴尬地道了歉，通讯频道随后安静了下来。
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

traits.locale_text: 经过两轮探测之后，船员截获了微弱的信号，来自深渊之中的其中一处工人定居点。由于连接不稳定，领班误以为你的飞船来自温特斯凯尔家族，因为他们得船早该在九个周期之前就抵达这颗行星。通过不稳定的频道，工头以严峻的声音报告，说这个世界的精金矿脉几乎已经全部采光，剩余的矿藏只能支撑不到十年的时间。双方经过好一番沟通之后，他才终于意识到，轨道上的这艘飞船来自另一个行商浪人王朝。工头尴尬地道了歉，通讯频道随后安静了下来。

languages.text: Tras dos guardias de exploración, la tripulación intercepta una débil señal procedente de uno de los asentamientos de trabajadores del abismo profundo. Debido a la inestabilidad de la conexión, el capataz confunde su nave con otra de Winterscale que debía haber llegado hace nueve ciclos. El capataz informa por el débil canal que los depósitos de mineral de adamantino están casi agotados y que el planeta estará totalmente minado en menos de una década. Con cierta dificultad, capta las palabras suficientes para entender que la nave en órbita pertenece a otra casa de Comerciantes Independientes, tras lo que se disculpa y se queda en silencio.
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.

traits.locale_text: Tras dos guardias de exploración, la tripulación intercepta una débil señal procedente de uno de los asentamientos de trabajadores del abismo profundo. Debido a la inestabilidad de la conexión, el capataz confunde su nave con otra de Winterscale que debía haber llegado hace nueve ciclos. El capataz informa por el débil canal que los depósitos de mineral de adamantio están casi agotados y que el planeta estará totalmente minado en menos de una década. Con cierta dificultad, capta las palabras suficientes para entender que la nave en órbita pertenece a otra casa Comerciante Independiente, luego se disculpa y se calla.

languages.text: Nach zwei Erkundungswachen fängt die Crew ein schwaches Signal ab, das von einer der Arbeitssiedlungen in der tiefen Kluft stammt. Aufgrund der instabilen Verbindung hält der Vorarbeiter dein Schiff irrtümlich für ein Winterzunder-schiff — eines, das vor neun Zyklen hätte eintreffen sollen. Über die schwache Verbindung berichtet der Vorarbeiter mit düsterer Stimme, dass die Adamantium-Vorkommen auf dem Planeten fast vollständig erschöpft sind und in weniger als einem Jahrzehnt sämtliche Rohstoffe abgebaut sein werden. Mit einiger Schwierigkeit versteht er genug von deinen Worten, um zu begreifen, dass das Schiff im Orbit zu einem anderen Freihändlerhaus gehört. Er entschuldigt sich unbeholfen und verstummt dann.
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. languages.text: İki keşif nöbetinden sonra mürettebat, derin yarıktaki işçi yerleşimlerinden birinden gelen, zayıf bir sinyal yakalıyor. Bağlantının dengesizliği sebebiyle ustabaşı; gemini, dokuz döngü önce gelmesi beklenen bir Winterscale gemisiyle karıştırıyor. Zayıf kanaldan durumu bildiren ustabaşı, zalimce dünyadaki adamantin yataklarının neredeyse tükendiğini ve gezegende on yıla kalmadan hiçbir şey kalmayacağını ifade ediyor. Güçlükle de olsa yörüngedeki geminin başka bir Hür Tacir hanesine ait olduğunu anlıyor, ardından beceriksizce özür diliyor ve sessizliğe gömülüyor.
languages.original_text: After two exploration watches, the crew intercepts a faint signal coming from one of the labour settlements in the deep chasm. Due to the unstable connection, the foreman mistakes your vessel for a Winterscale ship — one was due to arrive nine cycles ago. The foreman grimly reports over the weak channel that the adamantine ore deposits on the world are nearly depleted and that the planet will be fully mined out in less than a decade. With some difficulty, he picks up enough words to understand that the ship in orbit belongs to another Rogue Trader house, then awkwardly apologises and falls silent.
